name: Array
description: Pineapple and citrus. White grapes and lime zest aroma.   BRU-1, Nelson Sauvin, Motueka, Pacific Sunrise

name: Tides
description: Citrus, passionfruit and cantaloupe. Blueberry aroma. El Dorado, Citra, Mosaic, Simcoe

name: Scylla
description: Dark chocolate and toasted caramel layered on blackberry cola.

name: Sebastian
description: A Maibock brewed with 100% Pilsner malt and German and American Noble Hops.

name: Revive
description: Modern, hopped version of a traditional Finnish fermented-water beverage.

name: Glyphs
description: Tangerine, orange zest, and aromatic pine.   BRU-1, Simcoe, Strata, Michigan Chinook

name: Secrets
description: Passionfruit, pine, apricot, and orange zest. Dank pine and blueberry aroma.

name: Soleil
description: Dry orange, mimosa-esque. Floral notes and funky.

name: Terrini
description: Grassy, floral, and pithy orange aromas. Notes of pear, candied orange, and lemongrass flavors. Slightly sweet finish.

name: Kimik
description: Notes of heavy citrus, passion fruit, lychee, and a distinct guava aroma.

description: Pineapple, mango, and ruby red grapefruit. Aromatic.   Riwaka, Moutere, Motueka, Comet

description: Smooth and malty with light caramel and dark fruit notes with subtle cherry aroma.

name: Carnyx
description: Balanced richness, notes of coffee, and chocolate. A smooth, and creamy texture.

name: Alma
description: A radiant golden straw hue, with a robust all-malt foundation. A refreshing crispness is complemented by delicate floral and citrus notes that emerge in the finish.

name: Elias
description: Smooth, subtle citrus notes and floral aroma.

name: Brahms
description: A gentle roast that harmonizes with a medium-bodied crispness. Delicately balanced by a mild herbal bitterness.

name: Dom
description: Crisp ale with floral and pear notes, subtle grapefruit zest aroma.

name: Bresa
description: Tart ale with notes of lemon, lime, sea salt and coriander.

name: Marty
description: Light matcha-steeped, crisp ale.

name: Narada
description: Dank citrus and pine notes.   Amarillo, Citra, Michigan Chinook

name: Pomona
description: Tart ale fruited with cherry and raspberry.

name: Pomona
description: Tart ale fruited with mango and peach.

description: Stonefruit and citrus, juicy finish. Blueberry and melon aroma.   El Dorado, Ekuanot, Citra, Mosaic, Simcoe

name: Terra
description: Orange zest, marmalade, and grapefruit. Floral and spicy.   Wakatu, Motueka

name: Onsite I
description: Onsite I is the first of our pilot program. A raspberry fruited smoothie sour. No lactose.

name: Demeter
description: Cognac, candied orange, and caramel.

description: Bubble gum, papaya, blueberry, and dank citrus. Aromas of cannabis, grapefruit, stonefruit, and orange zest.   Simcoe, Comet, Strata

description: Light, citrus-forward summer crusher.

name: Sonnen
description: Plush tan head, a subtle sweetness of toasted malt, medium body.

name: Iroh
description: Subtle matcha and citrus.

name: Revada
description: Conditioned on strawberries, blueberries & hibiscus. Thicc and tart. Vibrant pink and full bodied.

name: Taupō
